flawed_nl_solution:
The classes in the pack cost $7.5 each because 75 / 10 = <<75/10=0.75>>0.75
An additional class costs $10 because 0.75 x (1 +(1/3)) = <<0.75*(1+(1/3))=1>>1
She buys 3 extra classes because 13 - 10 = <<13-10=3>>3
Her three additional classes cost $3 because 3 x 1 = <<3*1=3>>3
Her total cost is $78 because 75 + 3 = <<75+3=78>>78
#### 78

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7.5, not 0.75. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
